variant.text: A wide sweeping view of The Southern Plains engulfs the view. A few lone men stand on a ridge on the horizon.
What a world this has become.

group.name: Rangers
group.description: A group of lawmen dedicated to tracking down criminals throughout the Empire
group.goal: Rid the land of all criminal activity.
